name: Security Girl ver /_^ 2
description:
Security Girl ver /_^ 2 is a game that hasn't been downloaded properly and therefore has a couple of bugs, including a virus that will kill SG if she doesn't pick up the codes, scattered across your monitor fast enough.

In this game your monitor becomes the map instead of being the one showing you the map. The size of your window represents your vision range and you must search your entire screen for 4 Corrupted Codes while being attacked by Corrupted SG versions.

Warning: This game varies A LOT between computers and is more of a proof of concept than a fully playable game.  Also this game depends a lot on your screen resolution.

Music by: Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych
